website_summaries.verdict: Offers good support and some cushioning at a bargain price, and most athletes won’t sleep hot on this mattress.
pros: Good for athletes who are of light to average weight thanks to a combination of firm foam support and a contouring top layer
Sleeps cool for most due to cool gel infused throughout
cons: Edges are not very firm, which makes side and combination sleepers less comfortable

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: I was completely shocked how quickly this made an immediate difference. After years of sleeping on an expensive spring mattress with yrs left in it, my back was in severe pain. It was never a deep satisfying uninterrupted sleep. On this mattress, after only a single night. The complete lack of any soreness, pain or pressure. I had my first enjoyable uninterrupted painfree night for a long time. The benefits are obvious but the motivation of the energy and freedom from worry. Unparralled speed of recovery which continues all day. The foam supports all over the spinal cord and you sink into the total foamy support structure. Which helps the painful spots.
customer_reviews.author: wayne

customer_reviews.title: A Solid Night Sleep!
customer_reviews.text: For years we've been purchasing the standard coil mattress and it wasn't until recently we discovered the power of memory foam. When my son needed a guest bed for his loft we decided to search for something comfortable, yet budget friendly. Needless to say, he has been sleeping on it since:) This bed has been comfortable since the moment we received it (after the 48-72 hour waiting period). The memory foam is firm/sturdy, yet plush, and appears to retain it's shape nicely. It is thick and also comes with a removable cover - which can almost replace a standard mattress pad. My teenager spends a lot of time in bed and has slept soundly ever since - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Krista Black

customer_reviews.title: The Whole House Loves It
customer_reviews.text: Its really cool how they vaccum seal these memory foam mattresses. Just be careful when you unwrap it. They give you a letter opener to open it safely without cutting the mattress. but even me being carless i managed to nick the mattress, but nothing a little needle and thread didn't solve, after all it was my fault. So be very careful when you open it. Otherwise, this mattress is so comfy. I got this to replace my son's bed that was basically falling apart, but now, its the hit of the house. Eveyone wants to nap/sleep in my son's bed because its so comfortable. Good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Obake

customer_reviews.title: Like Sleeping on a Giant Marshmallow
customer_reviews.text: My son LOVES this mattress. He says it's the perfect mix between squishy and firm. The mattress came shrink wrapped and then rolled up. After slicing the shrink wrap open, we gave it 48 hours before we used it, but it puffed up to full thickness nearly immediately. The mattress appears to be very well made and high quality. Thus far, the mattress has fully held its shape, with no dips or bunching (I'll update my review if that changes) and my son loves his mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Momo3iB

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable mattress, good sleep
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mattress because there's no smell. It's convenient to put it on the bed frame. I don't like mattresses that are too soft or firm. But this mattress is medium firm, which is very comfortable to sleep on. I don't have insomnia and have good sleep since I slept on this good quality mattress. It's worth to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jieying Chen

customer_reviews.title: Don’t pay over a $1000 When you can pay $300. Very Happy!
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is a great value for the money. It took less time to inflate than instructions said as well. Overall comfort is outstanding as I am a 6’2 220lb guy that sleeps from back to side and stomach. My fiancé has rods in her spine from scoliosis and she doesn’t get a good sleep on it. It is on the very plush end of mattresses this type but curves with your body and is more than average supportive. For my first memory foam mattress I couldn’t be more pleased. Side note: my toddler got on it before we even got a sheet on and said “night night can I have?” She approves too haha.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Grubic

customer_reviews.title: Nice bed definitely recommend .
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy a this soft bed, and my hips and shoulders appreciate it too since I’m a side-sleeper. I did a lot of research and took a gamble in this bed (since it didn’t have many reviews, but the majority seemed positive).
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Finally Sleeping!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been sleeping on this mattress for a couple of weeks and I’m a big dude. It’s hard for me to find the right sleeping experience. Ever since I switched from my spring mattress to this, I sleep! Like, finally sleep! I’ve suffered from anxiety, ptsd and many other issues that make sleeping very difficult. This mattress helps me enormously! The price was amazing too! Right in the range I was looking to spend and was not disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron P.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: For a mattress that showed up in a box this thing is amazingly comfortable! I was skeptical when I received this but I'm here to tell you I've been sleeping on it for 3 weeks now and love it. I would recommend this mattress to anyone who likes a medium firm mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Nice mattress and good price.
customer_reviews.text: This bed is amazing.I have had this mattress for two weeks now and very satisfied with this mattress.The longer you lay on it the more it conforms to your body slightly and that's comfortable. It's seem to be just what I was looking for.Best sleep I 'be had in years no problems getting used to it. The shipping was fast,and it was very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality 10 inch mattress
customer_reviews.text: i have been looking for a good height mattress for my twin sized bed. This comes in perfect in size; but i am a bit skeptical about the memory foam. The old technology memory foam didn't work for me, too soft. This one however is firmer and i didn't get sweat from it. it does give me a good night sleep, especially the fabric is nice too. another fact is that i like the10in height of it. Good mattress!
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: I read the other buyer feed back; mainly the instruction to let the mattress lie flat for 72 hours before use. It assumed a thickness of 8 inches with in 4 hours. After 48 hours it expanded to the advertised 10 inches. I did detect a strong chemical odder for the first 48 hours. I rolled back and forth over it to move the air in side. This helped quite a bit. I placed it on the frame after 72 hours. The mattress is quite comfortable and seems to be medium firm.
customer_reviews.author: Finian Blake

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality queen mattress. No chemical smell. For what this costs you can't go wrong. I also own 2 Nectar mattresses and this thing is very very close in terms of sleep quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jason C. Mann

customer_reviews.title: Firm
customer_reviews.text: We’ve just had it a few days so I’m currently giving it a 3. It’s very firm. We’re using it in our 5 year olds room so luckily he doesn’t know the difference in mattress firmness, and kids need a slightly firmer bed anyway. As an adult I wouldn’t be able to sleep on this comfortably. Hopefully over a few months it will break in more.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Value purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES this twin xl in her room! We put it right over the standard issue horrible mattress, which serves as the box springs - just be sure to bring a fitted sheet. This mattress has great support and the 10 inches is definitely enough memory foam to give a wonderful night's sleep. At this price I can't think of a better investment in my daughter's education than a good mattress. She studies in bed up against a memory foam wedge placed right on this mattress and says it is much more comfortable than sitting at the desk in the wooden chair. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: L. Harnois

customer_reviews.title: Good value and comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: This memory foam mattress is medium/soft for it's firmness. It is close conforming so it does provide great support for back and stomach sleepers. This memory foam mattress is comfortable for it's price. Instructions to open the mattress was easy to follow. Like any other memory foam mattress, it does take a while to form it's shape and for the smell to fully go away. The smell isn't too overwhelming though. Overall, this is a comfortable and good mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: O M G
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are almost in our 40's. We have been on a search for the past few years for the right mattress. We both have bad backs & are side sleepers. And we both run hot when we sleep. I cannot even begin to tell you how life changing this mattress is. We both woke up from our first nights rest on it this morning. We didn't wake up sore or restless. It is so comfortable. Firm, but soft. It's like a memory foam cloud. Neither of us tossed or turned either. Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: California_Mama

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent mattress for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress! We need to replace a bed in our cottage, bunk house. This was a perfect choice! Amazingly comfortable! We ordered a queen size. Delivered by UPS in a large but manageable box, easy to open and came with the perfect little cutter to open the vacuum packed mattress. It was ready to sleep on in 24 hours. It's much lighter than a regular and therefore, easy to move. I love it!! I would buy one for my home if I didn't already own a Sleep Number bed that we spent a small fortune on. I highly recommend this mattress.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: pretty satisfied
customer_reviews.text: The mattress was vacuum packed, so the packaging was not unwieldy at all. The inflation process was quick, so there were no problems. The mattress is also very soft, and comfortable. It is a fine fit for me since it isn't too soft which usually leaves aches in my back, nor too hard to hurt my shoulders and spine. The size was perfect for me (5"8'), a single person. It serves its purpose well for its price, and I'm pretty satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: It’s firm
customer_reviews.text: I primarily got it because I wanted a mattress that I can sleep sideways on. It’s a lot better than my previous mattress but it’s not as marshmallow soft as I hoped it would be. Also, if you get a mattress cover, then it will reduce the memory foam effect so beware. [edit] Seller reached out to me and offered to rectify the problem. This mattress may not be suitable for me but, it is still one I can recommend to others, and a seller I can trust.
customer_reviews.author: Fizzy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I have slept on this mattress five nights now and it has been a great experience. I usually don't sleep well, as I would wake up constantly during the night, due to stresses and noise. Though I am still having trouble falling asleep, I didn't even wake up once in the past few nights. I also bought very good quality linen beddings, everything is new and good quality on my bed now, so that could also play a role. Now I see the value of investing in quality products in the bedroom - a good night's sleep is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mattress for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I am 5' 3" and 120 pounds. I purchased the twin XL. It fully inflated. Provides excellent support. I prefer firm mattress for my back. This mattress provides just the right amount of firmness yet, does not feel hard. I can tell the cool gel is working and look forward to warmer months when I can better evaluate how well the cool gel works. I am a side, stomach sleeper. I have only slept on the mattress for about 1 week. However, for years I have slept on the Bed in a Box brand. This mattress is comparable plus it has the cool gel (which my BNB did not) for much less $$.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love my mattress. My husband snores, so I finally gave up and got myself a twin mattress and frame for the spare room. After a couple weeks of sleeping on it, this mattress has softened up perfectly. My whole family now wants one too, including my husband! Edit: I’ve now had this mattress for almost a year. It’s super comfortable. I'm a side sleeper, and this mattress never makes anything ache. It's literally perfect, even more comfortable than the $3000 Tempurpedic my husband is still sleeping on. Win! I wouldn’t hesitate to buy another. What a great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for 10 inches. Delivery and set up great. Will finish review when it expands.
customer_reviews.text: I have had it on my frame for 52 hours and its only 5.5 inches should be 10 inches hope it expands to10 in the next 24 hours. Can not wait to try it out! I was so excited to get it hopeful at this point. It has been a week mattress never got over 6 inches. Amazon has great service already refunded my money was very nice about it. Will buy a different kind or just a topper for old mattress.
customer_reviews.author: anna courtney

customer_reviews.title: Puffs up quick don't have to wait hours.
customer_reviews.text: This matress is awesome! Got it for my daughter because she needed a new one. it is thick which is good easy to open came packaged great! even has a little blade in it for you to cut open the plastic. Did not take long at all to puff up it was quick. My daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Booker

customer_reviews.title: I didn’t get my 10”
customer_reviews.text: I let the mattress sit out and sleep on the couch for 3 days and the mattress only expanded 5 1/2 inches. I was extremely disappointed. Without full expansion I probably won’t get to have the comfort I am supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Supes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Product
customer_reviews.text: This arrived quickly. It expanded extremely fast and had no smell. As I am a stomach sleeper it was not right for me. The seller cheerfully refunded my purchase. I would not hesitate to buy from them again. As a back sleeper it would have been great. I never remain that way and always end up on my stomach. As an older person with lower back pain to start with it was just a bit too soft for me. It was best for me as a side sleeper but that just isn't me as I roll around to much.
customer_reviews.author: David Desparois

customer_reviews.title: Inofia 10 inch mattress
customer_reviews.text: Queen Mattress, Inofia 10 Inch Ventilated Cool Gel Infused Memory Foam Double Mattress in a Box was a great find. The mattress is firm and I like it that way as it supports you sleeping on your back as well as for side sleepers. Did not want a squishy spongey one. Highly recommend! Great value for a great mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Changed my life
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I would wake up with stiffness in my thoracic spine area, but after several minutes of being out of bed it would go away. I’ve had the mattress for nearly a month now and all of that stiffness has subsided, I sleep better than I used to, I toss and turn less, and I’ve gotten several compliments from everyone who tries it. It was a very easy buying experience and I loved watching it decompress when it first came, haha. Beware, though, it’s a massive box that it comes in, and you need to have room to allow it to decompress for a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Nawal A.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and comes with plastic on bed
customer_reviews.text: I'm quite pleased with this bed. When it came in a box I was a little sceptical but after following the instructions of opening it and watching it inflate (I guess you could call it inflate) I am very impressed with it. The thickness and firm but softness. I have read other reviews about bugs coming in beds but this one came just with the bed no bugs. Lol. I always suggest to leave the plastic on beds personally in case of any spills or accidents on beds. The plastic on this bed is not noisy when tossing and turning at night. I bought it more as a guest bed. But now it is in my daughter's room for her.
customer_reviews.author: Carmela myrthil

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: These guys really stick behind their 100 day guarantee, we did not love our 1st mattress (a little too firm), contacted the company and they let us KEEP that one and sent us a new one (it was softer), which we are very happy with. Thanks Inofia for such great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: David Penturf

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Mattress received. It feels so good and comfortable that I don't want to get up when I'm lying on it. There are no static electricity present. I've bought other mattresses before, and it's always a little static when it gets dry in winter. The fabric is really good, very satisfied, the product is exactly the same as the picture shown, they are thick enough, and there is also a non-slip design behind, the mat does not move, will buy more later, very worthy of recommendation to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Marble slab
customer_reviews.text: I spent days searching for a bed on here. Thought i finally found the one.... so disappointing. And im so broke now. This bed feels like your sleeping on a concrete slab. My back is killing me. I even added a topper and still no give. I know i cant get this back in the box to return so i dont know what im going to do. Just dont buy this unless you want to sleep on a massive rock and sob all night like i did ):
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Cox

customer_reviews.title: Breathable, comfortable,supportive
customer_reviews.text: It is packed in a small box with a vacuum sealed tube, but very heavy. After carefully removed the plastic, the mattress started to puffed up. There is no chemical ofor. It is very supportive, neither too firm nor too soft, I can feel my body is relaxing when I lay on the mattress. I sleep peacefully through the night.
customer_reviews.author: Yukily

customer_reviews.title: This mattress is firm
customer_reviews.text: Really firm. I didn’t think it would work for me but so far it has. I’ve slept on it for a week and aside from wanting a pillow top mattress cover I have been satisfied. This is my second memory foam mattress. The first slept better but did not hold up well. I’m hoping for longer than 4 years this time. I’ll update in a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product and service
customer_reviews.text: I tried this bed for the recommended 30 days. I’ve slept on other memory foam mattresses and this is the only one I haven’t liked. I feel overheated after 15 minutes and I usually don’t run hot while sleeping. My hips and back are sore no matter what position I sleep in. I reached out to the company and it took them a week to get back to me the first time and then I had to send multiple emails before they reached out again. They’re only offering a 75% refund, so much for the 100 night guarantee. I would not recommend this bed or the company to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lowell

customer_reviews.title: Stiff for the first few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: When you open it up, the bed expands very quickly and you can lay on it immediately. This causes the foam to be very stiff and hard for the first few weeks or so. Getting a comforter helps but nonetheless is what you get for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A Dow

customer_reviews.title: comfort too firm
customer_reviews.text: disappointed in the comfort and firmness of this mattress, it is hard! trying to sleep on it all night not good, The quality is very well made. Just too firm for me.
customer_reviews.author: Bret Adcock

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Sleep
customer_reviews.text: I love this mattress. Wish they made it in King size. I get a really good night sleep on this mattress. I had guest visit and they loved this mattress tremendously the first night! We were sad that this is the largest size from this company. One of those lucky finds.....A Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gramie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this foam mattress for my twin bed. It fits the bed frame very well. And I measured the height which is definitely 10 inch memory foam. The mattress covered with a zipped protector, makes it washable and removable. Laying on it, I feel very relaxed and comfortable. Worth your every penny. Highly recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Not soft!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is very firm. I absolutely disagree with some of the reviews. This is NOT for side sleepers. I only weigh 140 and am 5'11" tall and I don't sink into this mattress at all. My shoulders hurt badly after my first two nights. If you like a firm mattress this might be good for you.
customer_reviews.author: B. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my daughter, she loves it, it is very comfortable and soft. She enjoys her twin mattress very much. Highly recommended to friend. Good price and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Too firm
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in the firmness of this mattress. As other reviews have said, it is hard! It didn’t seem so firm just laying on it for a few minutes. After trying to sleep on it all night, I concur it is very firm. The quality does seem very good though.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Great Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is very very comfortable. It’s super soft and perfect for my daughter’s bed. There’s a really cool feeling through this mattress so she does not feel too hot at night. Nice packaging, came folded up and compressed, we just had to roll it onto the bed frame. The price is amazing for the mattress and i really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Weisheimer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommended and worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress thinking it would be temporary for my master bedroom. I had never purchased a mattress in a box via on-line shopping so I was unsure of what kind of quality I would receive. As it turned out, it was so comfortable that I've decided not to replace it and I'm thinking about getting a smaller size for the guest bedroom. A great purchase.!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 of these
customer_reviews.text: These mattresses are super thick and nice and comfortable all at the same time. They have this nice layer of cooling gel and they fit perfectly the fitted sheets I have.
customer_reviews.author: Joujou

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: We're very happy with this mattress. Our old one was 15+ years old so we were overdue. Quick arrival. Easy to set up. We let it sit for 2 days before we slept on it. No odor.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy VanTilburg

customer_reviews.title: Not Soft Firm like a rock
customer_reviews.text: The return process was awesome yet they will keep the $30 shipping return fee, it was a rock. Not soft at all and I have a Temper pedic bed. Bought this for my daughters room, if you want FIRM it’s for you! It is not soft like I read any the reviews
customer_reviews.author: KLuv79

customer_reviews.title: great mattress
customer_reviews.text: the mattress came in a small box, the mattress is soft and comfortable, the price is reasonable. will recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mark bawling

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Mattress
customer_reviews.text: The comfort is great combined with a metal frame platform support. I haven't noticed any quality issues and I would definitely consider buying again. This is used for a guest or emergency bed for unexpected company.
customer_reviews.author: *Hobby*

customer_reviews.title: Really nice
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for the quest room and was really skeptical about purchasing a mattress online without trying it out first but it is really comfortable. If you like a plush or soft feeling this is not for you. Bed is firm.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Mattress for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my guest bedrooms. My master bedroom has a $5,000 black ice mattress. This mattress gives the black ice a run for it's money and it's a fraction of the price!!! Highly recommend this mattress. Firm, but very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: RyanG

customer_reviews.title: Hot, Hot, Hot
customer_reviews.text: Nothing cool about this mattress. It's hot! I have to get up for 30 minutes in the middle of the night to let it cool down. Customer service, however, was superb! Seller worked hard to make things right and even offered a refund. All in all a good customer experience.
customer_reviews.author: Lee H

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: At first it wasn’t comfortable but after about a week or two my body was adjusted and it’s helped with my back/neck pain so much. My fiancé and me looked all over the place and read every review. We decided to purchase and hope for the best. Well we got more than what we imagined. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: Syeria Moon

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but corners didn’t expand as much as they should have
customer_reviews.text: Good, comfortable mattress for the price. Mine never inflated completely on the corners and I could have sent it back with the 100 night trial period but I’m lazy to do all that work and it doesn’t affect the mattress or my sleep so....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: This is not a 10” thick mattress. See photo. I would rate this as plush and not firm. Not very supportive for even a small to average build person.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Dasilva

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Perfect guestroom mattress.
customer_reviews.text: Very firm mattress makes for a good night sleep. Paired this with a low-profile 4" foundation and it's the perfect height for an antique bed.
customer_reviews.author: Carol W, Fort Wayne, IN

customer_reviews.title: On the firm side, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Although this mattress is too firm for our liking, the quality is great. I contacted Inofia customer service and they set up delivery for a softer mattress for us right away. If you like a firmer mattress this one will be great for you.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Vogel

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service, even though mattress didnt work out
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my husband did not take to this mattress, and found it hurt his back. However, the customer service was amazing and gave us a complete refund. We will probably use this for guests or a spare, hopefully it will be comfortable for other people and it just doesnt work for him
customer_reviews.author: Rivka Bornstein

customer_reviews.title: Bought two and made a split king.
customer_reviews.text: We both like different types of firmness. I figured for the price we could try them and if I didn't like my side I could get something else. Well its been a few months we both like them, I sleep longer, less tossing and turning. I have neck and back issues.
customer_reviews.author: BMB

customer_reviews.title: My daughter like
customer_reviews.text: This mattress is for my little princess , when I see such a small box, I am very disappointed, how so small, when I take the mattress out of the box,the mattress is flat, but when the air into the mattress, the mattress is grown, lie in the above of the mattress is very elastic, and not too hard, jump on it, also can jump very high, my daughter like.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Containing fiber glass
customer_reviews.text: Had it for over a year and when it was time to move we found out the mattress carries allot of fiber glass. If you are comfortable with that i suggest getting a strong mattress protector or don't ever fold the bed in half or roll it in a burrito the fiber glass will completely shoot out everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Carlos

customer_reviews.title: Return IS NOT hassel-free
customer_reviews.text: Mattress OK, it is too soft for a medium-firm mattress. Tried to return, but had to contact customer service and they didn't return my full amount (out $60 for trying the mattress) - NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: RadioactiveMom

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Best mattress I've had.. it's really comfy.. I read some other reviews of people saying their mattress had a smell to it but mine doesn't. Once I removed the plastic, my mattress immediately started to inflate and within 15 minutes it was at 6 inches, by 2 hours it was at the 10 inches. I don't toss & turn all night anymore, and it has helped with my back & neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Burcell

customer_reviews.title: Great Inofia Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful mattress for value! This is a high quality, firm, foam mattress. I contacted customer service because it is a little too firm for me; they were so helpful and responsive! It is always difficult buying a mattress online, you never know if you'll like it or not and it is great knowing that they have your back. (Literally, haha.)
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: We replaced our camper mattress, I was leary of buying without trying it, but took a chance for the price.It was Awesome! Soft on top and firmer underneath! Perfect! No more pain!!! A plus is it doesn't hold in heat! Perfect for my hot flashes!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri A.

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed for my son who has back issues and Is always achy. He loved the bed! He said he sleeps very well and I’m so glad!
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: STRONG SMELL & HARD BED
customer_reviews.text: Zero stars horrible bad smell is strong & super hard reviews are lies!!! Not accurate at all!!!! Im 100% a honest person.back hurt every time I get up!!! Got full refund back though.
customer_reviews.author: Ak

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, do not go to mattress firm and spend more.... Amazon prime rocks
customer_reviews.author: MarkMc1958

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is top quality! Set up was a breeze and customer service is amazing. They are quick to reply to emails. Five star seller!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product but not my cup of tea. It was to soft for me and the memory gel would encapsulate me and I couldn't get past that.
customer_reviews.author: Piddlerdude

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable it feel soft yet it's supportive to your back wake up with out achy back and neck this is my first time using memory foam mattress so far so good for two the last weeks
customer_reviews.author: IRIS

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is holding up. Really easy to expand and set up. It's pretty comfy. Zzz zzz
customer_reviews.author: :) Greta

customer_reviews.title: Yes, buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Got a good night's rest on the first night. Shipped quickly, easy to set up. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: CT Ali Cat

customer_reviews.title: AFTER SOME TIME, IT WORNS OUT AND FIBER PIECES COME OUT OF THE COVER
customer_reviews.text: At first, when I received it I thought it was great but after some months past by I started feeling some itching which are like little fibers, and it wore out really fast. I hope yall look at your product more closely or maybe I just got one that was damaged where the fibers came out, If you want a mattress for 5 months it is ok but if you want a mattress for a long time I'm not sure.
customer_reviews.author: ES

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have tried this mattress at a friend’s home several months ago. Really liked it. Very comfortable. When I needed another mattress, this was the first one one my list. Not disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this mattress for young or old!
customer_reviews.text: It’s only been a week but this is the best mattress I’ve ever had. No more tossing and turning, aches or pains and no hot spots. Molds to your body and wonderful support. No smells easy to set up. I didn’t receive the cutting tool so I just used my pocket knife. I would recommend a full mattress cover if you have pets or children as it’s spot clean only, which I did and bamboo sheets. Best sleep ever!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping so well I sleep through my alarms now
customer_reviews.text: Great bed! Supper comfy and a great value, it’s almost a steal. Only thing is, it’s just a tad bit bigger than a twin. It relatively fits on the frame, but it sticks out a bit. But it doesn’t take away from the comfort. Definite buy.
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable enough.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never had a mattress like this. It’s not like a spring mattress in that the body sinks down into this memory foam mattress a bit. Probably wouldn’t buy again, but It fit my price range.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Want to sleep good buy this bed!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and he loves it. He Says it's the best bed he's ever sleep on.
customer_reviews.author: bull123

customer_reviews.title: Good Mattress for price and Value.
customer_reviews.text: At first it had been too soft for my back. But now I am seeing how comfortable it is. It’s a very good mattress. I can move from one side to another and it will still support. Haven’t had back problems “like with my Sealy Spring Mattress”. I’ve had it for months now and still waiting for it to dip somewhere. But it just hasn’t happened and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Vianu23

customer_reviews.title: Great Mattress for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a new mattress and we figured we would try this one as he is still young and can sleep on most things without waking up with pains. He slept on it for a few nights and told us how great it was so I tried it and will be purchasing another for the master bed. The mattress is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: DMarino

customer_reviews.title: ITS A NICE MATTRESS
customer_reviews.text: IT IS NICELY MADE AND NOT TO HIGH FOR ME,FIRM BUT I WON'T BUY A MATTRESS THAT IS TO SOFT,BECAUSE OF THE BREAK IN TIME
customer_reviews.author: carolyn rita

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mattress for my daughter. It’s the perfect amount of firmness and softness. No lumps, no curving, no weird smells! Haven’t had any complaints from my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Feels great! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this mattress. It hugs us in all of the right places. Is just firm Enough. The edge doesn’t give way when you sit there like some memory foam mattresses do. I didn’t notice any cooling effect but it definitely didn’t get warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Its incredible
customer_reviews.text: Not to hard Not to soft It does not sink in like the previous one I bought from a different company It's everything I wanted in a matress
customer_reviews.author: Renee Rhoads

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and comfort! Highly recommend.... no smell either. Perfect choice...
customer_reviews.author: Jeepdrew22

customer_reviews.title: Very soft
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable. Finally i can get a good nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: shannon a.

customer_reviews.title: “It’s a okay bed for the price”
customer_reviews.text: Was hoping it was a little softer more on the firm side bought another inofia bed that was way better than this one...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Cashout

customer_reviews.title: great matress for the value. Does run warm fyi
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a great value and would buy again. The only neutral comment I would give, if you're a warm sleeper this matress does run hot. Not an uncomfortable thing, but i find myself kicking my blankets off. Will be nice in the winter! Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Bill L.

customer_reviews.title: not 10 inch mattress only approximatly 8.5 inch
customer_reviews.text: did not expand to 10 inches very soft mattress not medium firm would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft it is and it really conforms to your body. I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: S. Sears

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open
customer_reviews.text: It is a very comfortable mattress. I have a small back problem and sleeping on this mattress is great.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno

customer_reviews.title: My 14-year-old daughter likes it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a twin size bed for my daughter. She likes the bed and sleeps well every night since that.
customer_reviews.author: HC

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service
customer_reviews.text: We are giving the 5 star rating for the customer service. The mattress was very soft for our requirement and we were not able to sleep comfortably. There is no issue with the product itself its just the personal expectation which was not fulfilled. After contacting customer service refund was initiated. Appreciate the friendly customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Rohan Bondili

customer_reviews.title: It’s may need time to grow on me
customer_reviews.text: It’s not necessarily comfortable, but not uncomfortable either. It is thick and doesn’t have a chemical smell. I may need to just get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer 102

customer_reviews.title: Great  comfort!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent!! Great Quality. Very happy with this mattress. I advise to all don’t waste ur money on very pricey mattresses buy this!!
customer_reviews.author: Abhi P

customer_reviews.title: Wearing out too quickly
customer_reviews.text: Have had bed for a few months and it is starting to droop in the middle, not so comfy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. I love it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress last month, and I wanted to give it a full 30 days before I wrote my review. I must say that I am very pleased with my purchase. This mattress has the perfect balance. It’s firm, but not too firm, and soft, but not too so soft. Just the right amount of comfort for a good night’s sleep. Overall, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bridjette

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable mattress! It rose very quickly, customer service was very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Sizer

product_meta.title: Twin Mattress, Inofia 10 Inch Ventilated Cool Gel Infused Memory Foam Mattress in a Box, More Responsive & Airflow, Pressure Relief & Full Support, Medium Firm Feel,10 Inch, Twin Size
feature_bullets: 🍂【Multi-Layer Unique Designed Foam Mattress】- Inofia 10 inch gel infused memory foam mattress is designed with Multi-layer foam system, gel infused ventilated memory foam creates a plush and comfortable sleeping surface for a more restful night's sleep and high-density base foam relieves pressure points and conforms to your body, and provides unparalleled support during the night. 💓Please DO NOT wash the cover.
🍀【CertiPUR-US certified】- Our innovative foams inside are comfortable, and CertiPUR-US certified, Healthy and Eco-Friendly, guarantee your family sleep with no concern.

🌙【Pressure Relief & Full Support】- The open-cell memory foam bed mattress twin conforms to sleepers bodies for improved spinal alignment, greater pressure relief and eliminated motion transfer while keeping you cool. It supports each part of the body by evenly distributing your weight across the surface of the bed. If your partner or pet toss and turn during the night, you’ll still be able to sleep soundly without being disturbed.

😴【Cool-Sleeping System】- Inofia twin mattress comes with gel-infused memory foam top layer that is open cell and ventilated. Sleep comfortably while reducing sweat and perspiration during hot or humid weather.

📞【RISK-FREE 100 NIGHT TRIAL】- This 10 memory foam mattress is compressed and rolled in a box for easy door to door delivery. Please allow up to 72 hours (sometimes maybe longer due to other factors, like cold weather) for the double mattress to fully expand to its original shape and provide the best sleeping experience. Inofia offers 100 risk-free nights trial, so that you can be confident of our mattress. If you have any question, feel free to contact us at anytime.
